melody.description: There is no melody or mood associated with this line, which may be because it is the preamble to the hymn, or is not meant to be read in any particular melody or mood

author.author: None
author.description: There is no author associated with this line, as it may be the preamble to the hymn

text: ਲਾਖ ਭਗਤ ਆਰਾਧਹਿ ਜਪਤੇ ਪੀਉ ਪੀਉ ॥

translation.text: Tens of thousands of devotees worship and adore You, chanting, "Beloved, Beloved."

transliteration.text: lākh bhagat ārādhah japatē pīu pīu .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

author.author: Guru Arjan Dev
author.description:
Guru Arjan Dev [1563 - 1606] was the fifth Guru of the Sikhs, born at Goindval. He was the youngest of the three sons of Guru Ram Das, the fourth Sikh Guru.

Guru Arjan Dev finished the construction of the Harimandir Sahib, the Golden Temple, and compiled the first Sikh scripture, known as the Adi Granth. Shortly after he became the first martyr of the Sikh religion, which formed a turning point in the development of the faith.

text: ਕਵਨ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਮੇਲਾਵਉ ਨਿਰਗੁਣ ਬਿਖਈ ਜੀਉ ॥੧॥

translation.text: How shall You unite me, the worthless and corrupt soul, with Yourself. ||1||

transliteration.text: kavan jugat mēlāvau niragun bikhaī jīu .1.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਤੇਰੀ ਟੇਕ ਗੋਵਿੰਦ ਗੁਪਾਲ ਦਇਆਲ ਪ੍ਰਭ ॥

translation.text: You are my Support, O Merciful God, Lord of the Universe, Sustainer of the World.

transliteration.text: tērī tēk gōvind gupāl daiāl prabh .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਤੂੰ ਸਭਨਾ ਕੇ ਨਾਥ ਤੇਰੀ ਸ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਸਭ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥

translation.text: You are the Master of all; the entire creation is Yours. ||1||Pause||

transliteration.text: tūn sabhanā kē nāth tērī srisat sabh .1. rahāu .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਸਦਾ ਸਹਾਈ ਸੰਤ ਪੇਖਹਿ ਸਦਾ ਹਜੂਰਿ ॥

translation.text: You are the constant help and support of the Saints, who behold You Ever-present.

transliteration.text: sadā sahāī sant pēkhah sadā hajūr .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. This Raag gives the listener the determination and ambition to put aside any excuses and to proceed with the necessary action to achieve the aim. It generates feelings of passion and zeal to succeed and the energy generated from these feelings enables the listener to find the strength from within to achieve success, even when the achievement seems difficult. The determined mood of this Raag ensures that failure is not an option and motivates the listener to be inspired.

text: ਨਾਮ ਬਿਹੂਨੜਿਆ ਸੇ ਮਰਨ੍ਹਿ ਵਿਸੂਰਿ ਵਿਸੂਰਿ ॥੨॥

translation.text: Those who lack the Naam, the Name of the Lord, shall die, engulfed in sorrow and pain. ||2||

transliteration.text: nām bihūnariā sē maranh visūr visūr .2.

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਦਾਸ ਦਾਸਤਣ ਭਾਇ ਮਿਟਿਆ ਤਿਨਾ ਗਉਣੁ ॥

translation.text: Those servants, who lovingly perform the Lord's service, are freed from the cycle of reincarnation.

transliteration.text: dās dāsatan bhāi mitiā tinā gaun .

melody.description: Aasaa has strong emotions of inspiration and courage. text: ਵਿਸਰਿਆ ਜਿਨ੍ਹਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਤਿਨਾੜਾ ਹਾਲੁ ਕਉਣੁ ॥੩॥

translation.text: What shall be the fate of those who forget the Naam? ||3||

transliteration.text: visariā jinhā nām tinārā hāl kaun .3.

text: ਜੈਸੇ ਪਸੁ ਹਰ੍ਹਿਆਉ ਤੈਸਾ ਸੰਸਾਰੁ ਸਭ ॥

translation.text: As are the cattle which have strayed, so is the entire world.

transliteration.text: jaisē pas harhiāu taisā sansār sabh .

text: ਨਾਨਕ ਬੰਧਨ ਕਾਟਿ ਮਿਲਾਵਹੁ ਆਪਿ ਪ੍ਰਭ ॥੪॥੪॥੧੦੬॥

translation.text: O God, please cut away Nanak's bonds, and unite him with Yourself. ||4||4||106||

transliteration.text: nānak bandhan kāt milāvah āp prabh .4.4.106.
